item.title: Hawaiian Airlines set for Oneworld debut in April, pledges $600 million for airport, airplane and lounge upgrades
item.description: Hawaiian Airlines is planning a major $600 million upgrade spree in the wake of being acquired by Alaska Airlines in 2024.

item.title: New South Korean airline adds fifth destination in US
item.description: Air Premia will add Washington, D.C., flights starting in April.

item.title: United Airlines CEO hints at 'new aircraft types' amid plan to 'shake-up the industry'
item.description: United Airlines CEO Scott Kirby is hinting at some "surprises" to come from the carrier in 2026.
